# Double stroke letters

[Espanso](https://espanso.org) package to easy write Double stroke letters.

â­ï¸ Consider to star this package on [GitHub](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-double-stroke-letters/stargazers) â€” it helps!

## Triggers

| Keyword | Replaced |
| ------- | -------- |
| `;//A`  | `ğ”¸`      |
| `;//B`  | `ğ”¹`      |
| `;//C`  | `â„‚`      |
| `;//D`  | `ğ”»`      |
| `;//E`  | `ğ”¼`      |
